original_text: For he has set a day when he will judge the world with justice by the man he has appointed. He has given proof of this to everyone by raising him from the dead.”
korean_text: 이는 정하신 사람으로 하여금 천하를 공의로 심판할 날을 작정하시고 이에 그를 죽은 자 가운데서 다시 살리신 것으로 모든 사람에게 믿을 만한 증거를 주셨음이니라 하니라

sentences.original_text: For he has set a day
when he will judge the world with justice
by the man he has appointed
He has given proof of this to everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이것에 대한 증거를 모든 사람에게 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: by raising him from the dead
